ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
let key;
try {
    key = source.getLoginInfoMap()['请输入密钥'];
    if (String(key).length !== 16) {
    jj = '\n\n❌️当前用户未填写密钥，请先输入密钥\n密钥获取途径，书籍详情页，点击右上角点击登陆，获取后，填写，再次刷新详情页'
    } else {
    jj = ""
    }
} catch (error) {
    jj = '\n\n❌️当前用户未填写密钥，请先输入密钥\n密钥获取途径，书籍详情页，点击右上角点击登陆，获取后，填写，再次刷新详情页'
    }
</js>

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.name: book_name

bookSourceComment:
支持番茄小说，QQ免费小说，熊猫小说，得间小说，七猫小说，起点69小说

更新说明：
登录页新增手动切换书籍来源选项按钮
20241126修复bug

<js>
let data = {
    "男": {
        "玄幻": 7,
        "都市": 1,
        "洪荒": 66,
        "无敌": 384,
        "末世": 68,
        "诸天万界": 71,

        "漫威": 374,
        "火影": 368,
        "西游": 373,
        "龙珠": 376,
        "聊天群": 381,
        "海贼": 370,
        "奥特同人": 367,
        "特种兵": 375,
        "反派": 369,
        "校花": 385,
        "女帝": 378,
        "单女主": 389,
        "神奇宝贝": 371,
        "九叔": 383,

        "无女主": 391,
        "武魂": 386,
        "网游": 372,
        "战神": 27,
        "都市脑洞": 262,
        "都市种田": 263,
        "都市日常": 261,
        "历史脑洞": 272,
        "玄幻脑洞": 257,
        "奇幻仙侠": 259,
        "都市青春": 396,
        "传统玄幻": 258,
        "历史古代": 273
    },
    "女": {
        "幻想言情": 32,
        "现代言情": 3,
        "现言甜宠": 395,
        "现言脑洞": 267,
        "先婚后爱": 265,
        "都市日常": 261,
        "古言脑洞": 253,

        "重生": 36,
        "灵异": 100,
        "公主": 83,
        "甜宠": 96,
        "盗墓": 81,
        "系统": 19,
        "女强": 86,
        "皇后": 84,
        "推理": 61,
        "文化历史": 62,
        "生活": 48,
        "反派": 369,
        "末世": 68,
        "悬疑": 10,
        "穿越": 37,
        "学霸": 82,
        "扮猪吃虎": 93,
        "清穿": 76,
        "穿书": 382,
        "快穿": 24,
        "皇叔": 87,
        "空间": 44,

        "豪门总裁": 29,
        "影视小说": 45,
        "成功励志": 56,
        "职场": 127,
        "民国": 390,
        "都市生活": 2,
        "腹黑": 92,
        "星际": 77,
        "天才": 90,
        "古代言情": 5,
        "家庭": 125,
        "兽世": 72,
        "校园": 4,
        "诗歌散文": 46,
        "虐文": 95,
        "嫡女": 88,
        "王妃": 85,
        "精灵": 89,
        "马甲": 266
    }
};

let datas = [
    {
        "title": "番茄官方书架",
        "url": "{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/bookshelf?cookie={{java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')}}",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "晴天阅读记录",
        "url": "{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/bookshelf?key={{source.getLoginInfoMap()['请输入密钥']}}",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "书籍排行榜 ٩( ˃̶͈̀௰˂̶͈́ )و",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "推荐榜单",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?side_type=10',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "完结榜单",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?side_type=11',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "热搜榜单",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?side_type=12',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "黑马榜单",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?side_type=13',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "爆更榜单",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?side_type=15',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "巅峰榜单",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?type=0',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "男频精选",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?type=2',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "女频精选",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?type=3',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "每周推荐",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?type=1',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    }
];

function generateUrl(k, k1, sort, status) {
    return `{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?offset={{(page - 1) * 10}}&limit=10&tags=${data[k][k1]}&status=${status}&sort=${sort}`;
}

for (let k in data) {
    datas.push({
        "title": "❦ " + k + "生频道 ❧",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    });
    for (let k1 in data[k]) {
        datas.push({
            "title": k1,
            "url": '',
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "推荐排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 0, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "已完结",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 0, 'Finished'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "连载中",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 0, 'Loading'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });

        datas.push({
            "title": "评分排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 1, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "已完结",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 1, 'Finished'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "连载中",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 1, 'Loading'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });

        datas.push({
            "title": "热门排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 2, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "已完结",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 2, 'Finished'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "连载中",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 2, 'Loading'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
    }
}
JSON.stringify(datas);


</js>
